We didn't even get wrap party on the last job and on this one we're getting a launch party at the very start of filming. It feels good.
Awesome launch party after work tonight for the start of filming this week. Such a rare and lovely way to make the entire crew feel valued.
Almost finished watching #HighRise. I can say with confidence that it is in the running for my least favourite film ever.
@ReetuKabra Just realised what a stupid saying dog tired is. Tired of dogs, tired of life.
